Toggle Menu

City Council
============

Meetings
--------

The City Council meetings are generally held on the fourth Monday of every month, starting at 6:00 PM. Meetings are held at City Hall (2430 Roman Forest Blvd).  
  
​​

[View PDF](https://www.rftx.org/print/pdf/node/98)

Directions
----------

2430 Roman Forest Blvd.   
Roman Forest, TX 77357
